title:
Niagara Falls
 National Heritage Area
: Directions & Transportation
body: Directions       From the South: Take I-90 to I-290 north to I-190. Follow the signs to Niagara Falls.  From Canada: Cross the Niagara River on either Ontario Provincial Highway 420 in Niagara Falls, Ontario, or Provincial Highway 405 north of Niagara Falls, Ontario.
